resource-agent.name: fence_openstack
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for OpenStack's Nova service
resource-agent.longdesc: fence_openstack is a Power Fencing agent which can be used with machines controlled by the Openstack's Nova service. This agent calls the python-novaclient and it is mandatory to be installed

parameter.shortdesc: Fencing action
